replies.msg:
唔會
其實大學有好多途徑比你去識人
只不過每一種方式都唔係個個都啱

例如你覺得自己好易係一大班人入面
可以短時間內打成一片
又鍾意一班人玩下game嘅
咁可能玩ocamp會啱你玩又識到人

如果唔係其實遲啲開sem
上堂同下隔離左右吹下水
再唔下參加下啲活動 eg social services, peer mentoring 要識人都唔係太難

Dear members of HKUST,



You are sincerely invited to a forum I am going to host at 6pm on August 22, 2019 (Thursday).



Hong Kong has undergone unprecedented challenges recently. HKUST, as a university, is a place for diverse opinions, open exchanges and independent thinking. While we all have our viewpoints, it is important that we exercise mutual respect and listen to each other. With this in mind, I would like to invite all HKUST students, staff, faculty, and alumni to get together to have a dialogue on the current situation in Hong Kong.



In view of the busy schedules of different members, the forum will be held in an evening to accommodate as many as possible. Details are as follows:



Date: August 22, 2019 (Thursday)

Time: 6 to 7:30 pm

Venue: Citi Lecture Theater (LT A)

Basic language: English

Registration: https://president-forum.ust.hk/registration.php



The forum is exclusively reserved for the HKUST community. Please register if you would like to join us. Upon successful registration, you will receive a confirmation e-mail with a QR code for admission. Please bring the confirmation email or your HKUST ID card to the registration counter on site. If you are interested but cannot come, you can view live streaming via the HKUST Website’s main page (www.ust.hk).



I look forward to seeing you.



Best regards,

Wei Shyy
